duties_responsibilities.duty: Support daily accounting activities and monthly close activities.
Prepare journal entries and support documents for A/P and project accruals.
Reconciliation of legal claims and monthly accruals of legal settlements and insurance reimbursements.
Reconciliation of clearing broker’s cash activity and associated journal entries.
Prepare Blackline account reconciliations and ensure complete/accurate support documentation.
Assist with external compliance and audit requests.
Perform other accounting tasks as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or equivalent
